LanguageData.Plant_Moss.label: moss
LanguageData.Plant_Moss.description: Wild moss that grows in clumps in areas of low light and cool temperatures. Moss takes a long time to grow, but is very frost-resistant.
LanguageData.Plant_ShrubLow.label: low shrubs
LanguageData.Plant_ShrubLow.description: Low broadleaf shrubs. These grow in clusters and slow down movement somewhat.
LanguageData.Plant_Chokevine.label: chokevine
LanguageData.Plant_Chokevine.description: Dense shrub which slows down anyone moving over it.
LanguageData.Plant_Brambles.label: brambles
LanguageData.Plant_Brambles.description: Tangled, thorny, woody shoots covered with leaves. Slows down anyone moving over it a little bit.
LanguageData.Plant_Fern.label: fern
LanguageData.Plant_Fern.description: A soft, leafy plant that reproduces using spores.
LanguageData.Plant_Bromeliad.label: bromeliad
LanguageData.Plant_Bromeliad.description: A plant adapted to warm climates. It can grow on thin soil and traps water in its leaves.
LanguageData.Plant_Hosta.label: hosta
LanguageData.Plant_Grass.label: 草
LanguageData.Plant_Grass.description: 野草，在稍微有点光线和土地的地方就会长出来。
LanguageData.Plant_TallGrass.label: 高草
LanguageData.Plant_TallGrass.description: 野生的高草。从上面走过时速度会明显变慢。
LanguageData.Plant_Haygrass.label: 干草
LanguageData.Plant_Haygrass.description: 各种营养丰富的草混合在一起种植，产出大量用于喂养动物的干草。干草是很好的饲料，但对于人类来说难以下咽。
LanguageData.Plant_WildRose.label: 野玫瑰
LanguageData.Plant_WildRose.description: 野玫瑰是由玫瑰的种子长成的红色花朵，叫做野玫瑰。这种植物也被称为带刺玫瑰、硬刺玫瑰和北极玫瑰。它们被用于由烟草工作台卷制成各种奇异口味，也由医疗工作台制成的高级医药包，以及最后，从烹饪炉制成的豪华餐食。
LanguageData.Plant_Hypericum.label: 金丝桃
LanguageData.Plant_Hypericum.description: 金丝桃属植物产生一种药用花，叫做金丝桃。它们被用于由烟草工作台卷制成各种奇异口味，也由医疗工作台制成的高级医药包，以及最后，从烹饪炉制成的豪华餐食。
LanguageData.Plant_Mint.label: 薄荷
LanguageData.Plant_Mint.description: 薄荷植物是一种长有芳香叶的草本植物。它们被用于由烟草工作台卷制成各种奇异口味，也由医疗工作台制成的高级医药包，以及最后，从烹饪炉制成的豪华餐食。
LanguageData.Plant_Onion.label: 洋葱
LanguageData.Plant_Onion.description: 洋葱植物生产一种叫做洋葱的球茎蔬菜。它们被认为是一种奢侈的作物，用于烹饪奢侈食物。切开洋葱的时候会释放一种刺激性的化学物质，会让你泪流不止！
